extensionDescription.message: Lets you open a new tab at any position.

keyboardDescNewTabAtCurrPos.message: Opens a new tab at the currently selected tab's position.
keyboardDescNewTabAtCurrPos.description: Description for the keyboard shortcut to open a new tab at selected tab's position (right).

NewTabHerePageContextMenu.description: Open new tab in page's context menu

NewTabHereTabContextMenu.description: Open new tab in tab's context menu

NewTabHereToolsMenu.description: Open new tab in tools menu

DisableInCustomizationMenu.message: To disable the toolbar button use Firefox' customization menu.
DisableInCustomizationMenu.description: Info to use Firefox's customization menu to disable toolbar button.

ChangeKeyboardShortcutDesc.message: This shortcut can be changed in the add-on shortcut settings, see
ChangeKeyboardShortcutDesc.description: Info on how to change keyboard shortcut.

NewTabPos_TB_Button_Setting.message: Where shall the new tab be opened (relative to the currently selected tab) when the toolbar button is clicked:

NewTabPos_Page_Context_Setting.message: Where shall the new tab be opened (relative to the currently selected tab) when a page's contextmenu is used:

NewTabPos_Tab_Context_Setting.message: Where shall the new tab be opened (relative to the tab clicked on) when a tab's contextmenu is used:

NewTabPos_ToolsMenu_Setting.message: Where shall the new tab be opened (relative to the currently selected tab) when the tools menu entry is used:

NewTabPos_Keyboard_Setting.message: Where shall the new tab be opened (relative to the currently selected tab) when the keyboard shortcut (default: Ctrl + Y) is used:
